trans-unit.source: This class represents the application security trust information.
trans-unit.target: Denne klassen representerer programmet klarering sikkerhetsinformasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Resets the <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo"></xref> object to its default state of full trust.
trans-unit.target: Tilbakestiller det <xref href="Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo"> </xref> objektet som standardtilstanden for fullstendig klarering.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the application has permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om applikasjonen har tillatelse til å kalle ubehandlet kode.

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read.
trans-unit.target: "Programmet" henviser til programmet som manifestet blir lest.

trans-unit.source: You can read the deployment manifest using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese distribusjon manifestet bruker <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>eller <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the application has permission to call unmanaged code.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om applikasjonen har tillatelse til å kalle ubehandlet kode.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the application is full trust or partial trust.
trans-unit.target: Bestemmer om programmet er fullstendig klarering eller delvis klarering.

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read.
trans-unit.target: "Programmet" henviser til programmet som manifestet blir lest.

trans-unit.source: You can read the deployment manifest using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese distribusjon manifestet bruker <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>eller <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether the application is full trust or partial trust.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om programmet er fullstendig klarering eller delvis klarering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the permission set object for the application trust.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tillatelse set-objekt for programmet klarering.

trans-unit.source: A PermissionSet object for the application trust.
trans-unit.target: Et PermissionSet-objekt for programmet klarering.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets whether to preserve partial trust permission when the full trust flag is set.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir om du vil beholde delvis klarering tillatelse når fullstendig klarering-flagget er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Normally when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A> is set to `True`, all permission settings are deleted.
trans-unit.target: Vanligvis når <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A>er satt til `True`, slettes alle innstillingene for tillatelser.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to preserve these settings (typically during design time), you can call this method to persist the permission settings even when <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A> is set to `True`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil beholde disse innstillingene (vanligvis under utformingen), kan du kalle denne metoden hvis du vil beholde tillatelsen innstillinger selv når <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A>er satt til `True`.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.IsFullTrust%2A>

trans-unit.source: `PreserveFullTrustPermissionSet` should not be set to `True` for ClickOnce deployments because this violates ClickOnce schema requirements.
trans-unit.target: `PreserveFullTrustPermissionSet`kan ikke angis til `True` for ClickOnce distribusjoner fordi dette bryter ClickOnce skjemaet krav.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `False` with full trust specified, then any permissions defined in the permission set object will be dropped on save.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `False` med fullstendig klarering er angitt, deretter alle tillatelser som er definert i tillatelsen set-objekt forkastes ved lagring.

trans-unit.source: A Boolean value indicating whether to preserve partial trust permission when the full trust flag is set.
trans-unit.target: En boolsk verdi som angir om du vil beholde delvis klarering tillatelse når fullstendig klarering-flagget er angitt.

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Leser programmet klarering fra en XML-fil.

trans-unit.source: The data stream must contain only a \<TrustInfo> section and no other data.
trans-unit.target: Dataflyten må bare inneholde en \<TrustInfo > delen, og ingen andre data.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir en inngående dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Leser programmet klarering fra en XML-fil.

trans-unit.source: The specified string must contain only a \<TrustInfo> section and no other data.
trans-unit.target: Den angitte strengen må inneholde bare en \<TrustInfo > delen, og ingen andre data.

trans-unit.source: The name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på inndatafilen.

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Leser programmet klarering fra en ClickOnce-programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir en inngående dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Reads the application trust from a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Leser programmet klarering fra en ClickOnce-programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: The name of the input file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på inndatafilen.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the level of same site access permitted, specifying whether the application has permission to communicate with the server from which it was deployed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilgangsnivået samme område tillatt, angir du om programmet har tillatelse til å kommunisere med serveren den ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read.
trans-unit.target: "Programmet" henviser til programmet som manifestet blir lest.

trans-unit.source: You can read the deployment manifest using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> or <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lese distribusjon manifestet bruker <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>eller <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>.</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A> </xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string indicating the level of same site access permitted.
trans-unit.target: En tekststreng som angir tilgangsnivået samme område er tillatt.

trans-unit.source: The values can be <xref uid="langword_csharp_site" name="site" href=""></xref> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_none" name="none" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Verdiene kan være <xref uid="langword_csharp_site" name="site" href=""> </xref> eller <xref uid="langword_csharp_none" name="none" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_site" name="site" href=""></xref> specifies that the application can call Web services at the same URL from which it was deployed; if deployed from a share, the application has permission to read files from that share.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_site" name="site" href=""></xref>Angir at programmet kan ringe webtjenester på samme side som det ble tatt i bruk; distribuert fra en ressurs, har applikasjonen tillatelse til å lese filer fra den delte ressursen.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_none" name="none" href=""></xref> specifies that the application can neither access Web services from the same URL from which it was deployed, nor access files from the share from which it was deployed.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_none" name="none" href=""></xref>Angir at programmet kan heller ikke tilgang til webtjenester fra samme URL-adressen som det ble tatt i bruk, og heller ikke tilgang til filene fra den delte ressursen den ble brukt.

trans-unit.source: "Application" refers to the application for which the manifest is being read (using <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest*>).
trans-unit.target: "Programmet" henviser til programmet som manifestet blir lest (ved hjelp av <xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest*>).</xref:Microsoft.Build.Tasks.Deployment.ManifestUtilities.TrustInfo.ReadManifest*>

trans-unit.source: Returns all the information in the application security trust object as a string.
trans-unit.target: Returnerer all informasjonen i applikasjonsobjektet for sikkerhet klarering som en streng.

trans-unit.source: A string containing the information in the application security trust object.
trans-unit.target: En streng som inneholder informasjonen i applikasjonsobjektet for sikkerhet klarering.

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Skriver programmet klarering til en XML-fil.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an output stream.
trans-unit.target: Angir en output-dataflyten.

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to an XML file.
trans-unit.target: Skriver programmet klarering til en XML-fil.

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på utdatafilen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to a new template ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Skriver programmet klarering til en ny mal ClickOnce-programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \<TrustInfo> section, and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppdaterer bare den \<TrustInfo >-delen i en fil som inneholder bare på øverste nivå manifest hodet den \<TrustInfo > delen, og ikke noe annet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an output stream to which to write the updated manifest file.
trans-unit.target: Angir en output-dataflyten som å skrive oppdaterte manifestfilen.

trans-unit.source: Writes the application trust to a ClickOnce application manifest.
trans-unit.target: Skriver programmet klarering til en ClickOnce-programmanifest.

trans-unit.source: The name of the output file.
trans-unit.target: Navnet på utdatafilen.

trans-unit.source: Updates an existing ClickOnce application manifest with the specified trust.
trans-unit.target: Oppdaterer en eksisterende ClickOnce-programmanifest med den angitte klareringen.

trans-unit.source: This method updates only the \<TrustInfo> section in a file containing only the top-level manifest header, the \<TrustInfo> section, and nothing else.
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden oppdaterer bare den \<TrustInfo >-delen i en fil som inneholder bare på øverste nivå manifest hodet den \<TrustInfo > delen, og ikke noe annet.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an input stream containing the manifest to be updated.
trans-unit.target: Angir en inndatastrømmen som inneholder manifestet oppdateres.

trans-unit.source: Specifies an output stream to which to write the updated manifest file.
trans-unit.target: Angir en output-dataflyten som å skrive oppdaterte manifestfilen.
